scenario: Manual mode priority over all conditions
Smoke priority over humidity and CO2
Humidity below threshold continues to CO2
CO2 at high threshold returns powerHigh
CO2 above high threshold returns powerHigh
CO2 at mid threshold returns powerMid
CO2 between mid and high returns powerMid
CO2 at low threshold returns powerLow
CO2 between low and mid returns powerLow
CO2 below all thresholds returns powerLow
